Sasuke uploaded other AMG OVA episodes, and people say they're with Polish hardsubs. So be warned. My version of this OVA has sound/video in Japanese only, and I can find separate English subtitles (.srt/.ssa). If you think you'll download and help me seed these, feel free to PM me anytime. The more people tell me they want it, the more likely I'll upload OVA.
